subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin edged Dwain Chambers to win a 100-meter race in Madrid. Gatlin, who ran a 10.10, returned to competition last year after a four-year ban for a second positive drug test.
snippet: Justin Gatlin edged Dwain Chambers to win a 100-meter race in Madrid. Gatlin, who ran a 10.10, returned to competition last year after a four-year ban for a second positive drug test.
